event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1879

data.event: Stockton was incorporated as a city in 1879.
Stockton survived & grew during the thirteen years from founding until the arrival of the railroad in 1885.

event.title: was featured in British author Tony Parker's 1989

data.event: Stockton was featured in British author Tony Parker's 1989 book Bird, Kansas in which he transcribed tape recorded interviews with local residents.
